summary: Tested Attribute Icons API and Admin Panel UI for Ionicons management. All 18 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend admin panel icons page loads correctly and displays icon grid with proper filters.

integration_issues.issue: Stats cards (Total, Active, Category, Attribute counts) not visible when user is not authenticated - this is expected behavior as the /api/attribute-icons/stats endpoint requires authentication

critical_code_review_comments: Attribute Icons router properly follows factory pattern with (db, require_admin) dependencies
Public endpoints correctly exclude MongoDB _id from responses using {'_id': 0} projection
IONICONS_LIST contains 154 common Ionicons for UI display
DEFAULT_ICONS contains 73 pre-configured icons for various categories (auto, properties, electronics, phones, fashion, jobs, pets, global)
Soft delete pattern implemented for icons with is_active flag
Frontend fetchStats() catches 401 errors silently - stats only shown to authenticated admins
Frontend properly uses api utility with auth token interceptor

success_rate.frontend: 100% (icons page loads, grid displays, filters work)

seed_data_creation: 73 icons already seeded via /api/attribute-icons/seed endpoint before testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Attribute Icons feature is fully functional. All endpoints tested: GET /ionicons (154 icons), GET /public (73 seeded icons), GET /by-category/{id}, GET /stats (auth required), POST (create), PUT (update), DELETE (soft delete), POST /seed (idempotent). Frontend admin panel at /admin/icons displays icons grid with category/type filters, search, and CRUD buttons. Icons use Ionicon names like 'car-outline' stored as strings.

frontend_ui_verification.admin_dashboard: PASSED - Shows Attribute Icons card link
frontend_ui_verification.icon_cards: PASSED - Shows icon, name, ionicon_name, type badge, category, edit/delete buttons
